message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA 

The paper deals with reinforcement learning and transfer learning, which are core topics in machine learning. Specifically, it focuses on policy advice from multiple teachers, which falls under the category of multi-agent learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves theoretical analysis and regret bounds, which are common in the fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and robotics (cs.RO). The use of exploration and exploitation strategies is also relevant to control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper deals with negative transfer, which is a concept that is relevant to many areas of machine learning, including multi-agent learning and reinforcement learning, as well as to optimization and decision-making (cs.MA).
